titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Caroline Tunstel
CWG13660

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
The State of Kentucky,
To Caroline Tunstel, Dr.

row.cell: For washing for Hospital of Ky. recruits for one month.

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

I. R. Hutchinson
Acting Surgeon Quarter-Master.
Received at Frankfort Ky. the 11 of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, Eight dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account.

No 40 Abstract. G
Caroline Tunstill
Dollars 282.050/100
Paid March 11 1864

This claim is all right & will be paid as soon as funds are provided -- Jany. 21/64
S. G. S.
